main event: Mrs. Carney and her daughter Barbara observed a luminous object with four lights in the sky while parked on Old Lowell Road in Westford, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 45 minutes,The colors of the lights included white, orange, and blue-green,The object moved slowly before rapidly accelerating out of sight,Mrs. Carney and her neighbors reported multiple UFO sightings in the past year,This case remains unexplained by military investigation.
witness description: Mrs. Carney and her daughter Barbara
